title: Process Actor Residual Payment
description: An agent needs to process a residual payment for an actor whose TV show is now in syndication.

tasks.description: Retrieve the actor's contract and the syndication agreement for the TV show.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the actor's residual payment terms.

tasks.description: Calculate the residual payment owed based on the terms and the recent syndication revenue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the correct payment amount.

tasks.description: Generate a payment statement and schedule the payment to the actor's agent.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the statement and queues the payment.
